solution_line_template: There are {cubs_born_per_month}-{lions_die_per_month}=<<{cubs_born_per_month}-{lions_die_per_month}={net_increase_per_month}>>{net_increase_per_month} more lions each month.
There will be {net_increase_per_month}*{months_per_year}=<<{net_increase_per_month}*{months_per_year}={total_increase_per_year}>>{total_increase_per_year} more lions after 1 year.
There were {lions_after_one_year}-{total_increase_per_year}=<<{lions_after_one_year}-{total_increase_per_year}={initial_lions}>>{initial_lions} lions in Londolozi at first.
